title: Pointer Mace
intro: Pointer Mace was built around one simple idea: hitting stuff with a mace is really fun! The goal of the game is to survive for a long time and get as many points as you can.

title: Jet Spaceman
intro: Jet Spaceman is an arcade-style space shooter. Try out the charge shot mechanic, it's pretty interesting.

title: Duckoman
intro: Duckoman was one of the first games I made using Unity. You play as a duck, and you fight enemies that keep you from getting to the end of the level.
